name: Meritus Pelangi Beach Resort & Spa, Langkawi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We went on our honeymoon to Langkawi Malaysia in February 2006. We wanted to stay at Tanjung Rhu the whole 10 nights but it was full the first 5 nights.
reviews.title: Worst experience ever!
Paradise on earth
reviews.text: Anyway, we paid extra to get a deluxe sea view-room and came to the hotel around 15.00. The staff in the reception did not take notice about us at first; I had to ask for their notice. The check in worked as it would do at a two to three star hotel...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Then one of the guys driving the buggy took us to our room. We got a room in the southern end of the resort at second floor. He helped us up with the bags but I went down to get the rest of the luggage. He surprisingly talked to my wife about how we would make Langkawi baby... NICE.
reviews.title: Relaxing and friendly

likes.disliked: — Large resident lizard by the pool!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room...
reviews.title: Excellent Choice
Absolute bliss!
reviews.text: Everything was very dirty. The bed sheets were dirty and with bloodstains. The towels were full of bloodstains. There were at least six spiders that I killed and some 12 or so mosquitoes. The balcony door had a 2-3 centimetres big gap and all the windows had 0,5 centimetres big gaps so all animals and bugs had there own highway in to the room. Check out our pictures and see for yourselves.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed at the Meritus the last week of June for 6 nights. I was somewhat worried, having read the reviews on this site. But the Meritus did not disappoint! We had booked a gardenview room via a website and got a really good deal. When we got to the room, it wasn't gardenview but lakeview (room 3703). Very spacious and clean. I was worried that we might have mosquitos because of the lake (and mosquitos like me), but luckily there were hardly any.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay, perfect for young kids who like swimming

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Bathroom was clean (although the floor under the sink could have been mopped more), even the showercurtain (which can sometimes be smelly if it isn't washed regularly). Amenities were plentiful and replaced everyday.
reviews.title: Overpriced and disappointing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Breakfast was very good, lots to choose from. And we never had to wait for a table. Our toddler could always sit in a kid's chair (also at other restaurants in and outside the resort).
reviews.title: Not worth the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our girl had a blast. She went swimming every day. The pool is clean and shallow enough for her feet to touch the bottom. The only thing missing was a lifeguard.
reviews.title: very expensive and no things for complimentary

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010
reviews.text: The location of the resort is also good. A short stroll will take you to many restaurants. We liked Orchid Ria very much, we ate there several times.
reviews.title: Stayed here for three night and thought...
Fantastic Resort
reviews.text: Booked this holiday with Virgin and after booking and reading all the terrible reviews, was really concerned and worried about what i had booked! However, was so glad i did not change it... On arrival we were upgraded to a lake view room, which was fantastic and even had view of the beach as well. Reception even called to ensure we were happy with our room and stipulated we could look at other rooms if it was not adequate. Staff were all very friendly and happy to help with anything requested. Only ate at the hotel once as there were so may other restaurants to choose from 5 minutes walk away. The resort was very quiet and so relaxing, just what we needed and i really could not fault it on anything.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the negative comments from other people reviewing this hotel:
reviews.title: beautiful location

likes.liked: — the sea view from the room

reviews.title: Best of intentions, but not a 5* resort
reviews.text: It is close to the airport, however, it is a very small island, so i am sure that you would hear the planes at what ever resort you stayed in.

reviews.title: Wonderful holiday
reviews.text: The beach, it does have lots of shells, but most beaches do! and the beach was deserted most of the time, which made it even better for us....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Algae in the pond, in hot climates you will find this in ponds, however it was cleaned on a regular basis as was the rest of the resort and was clean to a very high standard.
reviews.title: very nice indeed!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just finished off our holiday at The Pelangi Beach and Spa Resort in Langkawi for 7 days. We are a well travelled couple and would like to inform others that we found this Hotel to be exceptional in location and setting, with spacious and luxurious accommodation, excellent facilities with impeccable cleanliness and professional staff.
reviews.title: Excellent, Excellent, Excellent !

likes.disliked: — Could see aeroplanes approaching the airport but not noisy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found "Service with a Smile" throughout our stay and the staff could not have been more professional, helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: Quiet & Quality at this Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The four restaurants covered all of our needs whether we wanted buffet or a' la carte with local cuisine, thai, chinese, western, meditteranean, fish dishes or steaks from the USA! We compliment the chef and all staff within the restaurants whom the hotel management should be very proud of.
reviews.title: Nice and relaxing but .....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We pampered ourselves a lot in the Spa and found the setting very tranquil and relaxing again with very polite and professional staff.
reviews.title: Part lovely, Part mediocre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006
reviews.text: Walking through the resort to your accommodation or facililites is so pleasant; beautifully designed pathways, gardens passed the lake with fountains or the freeform pools with waterfalls, islands, bridges and swim-up bar. So difficult to describe the natural beauty portrayed which makes you feel so relaxed and at peace on holiday. The whole resort is immaculately maintained and clean.
reviews.title: VERY AVERAGE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I have just returned from 4 nights at the Pelangi Beach Resort.
reviews.title: Great but not without compromises

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Upon arrival at the hotel we were greeted with a complimentary drink whilst waiting for our room to be prepared. Check-in was swift and we were given a buggy ride to our (standard) room.
reviews.title: Pelangi Paradise!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On entering the room we were dissapointed - it was 'tired' and desperately in need of renovation. It looked like the room had not been updated since it was built several years ago. We discussed our feelings with the management who advised us to upgrade our room. Thankfully, the superior room was much better, which meant we could dump our bags and hit the beach!
reviews.title: Definitely not 5 Star

likes.disliked: — Noisy and dark rooms which have seen better days

reviews.title: No complaints!
reviews.text: The beach is absolutely stunning, white sand, beautiful views and a variety of watersports for you to try.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: The hotel has a nice pool with built in restaurant and bar (which is always busy).
reviews.title: best all rounder

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arrived at Meritus Pelangi hotel and instantly you are amazed with the style of the lobby. Very Very nice! Check-in was quick and a driver in a golf-cart style vehicle takes you to your room.
reviews.title: Nice location and pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: At first impressions the room is really nice but as night settles, you will notice that some windows do not close properly. This might not seem much of a problem at first but when beetles and mossies start to appear in your room, you kind of wonder what why you paid so much money for a room like this. The room comes with a electronic mossie repellant device. I would suggest you use this. The first day i did not turn this on and was visited by a hungry mossie at night.
reviews.title: Please DO NOT stay here, should have heeded the warnings on tripadvisor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: The pool is lovely and the location is great. You are right next to the Beach, Pantai Cenang and about a 15 min walk to Underwater world. Along the way are some lovely restaurants and is quite busy at nights. There are also a few internet cafes along the way, one opposite Underwater world, next to the Taj Mahal restaurant. I had lunch here and it was great.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel on its own....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't really enjoy the breakfast as much here. Pretty much the same thing everyday...they should at least mix it up a bit..
reviews.title: Heaven with a pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wifi costs 50 RM a day and 24 for an hour which is really a rip-off. I would suggest visiting an internet cafe close tot he hotel. I found one for 3 RM and hour.
reviews.title: Rest and Relaxation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We book our 5 days stay at Meritus Pelangi before reading the reviews here. It did gave us doubts if we should go ahead or to change our booking to another hotel. But after a few phone conversation with one of Pelangi's representative and some convincing, we decided to give Pelangi a try. And glad that we did not change our mind. It is one of our most enjoyable holiday!
reviews.title: Beautiful & clean room, good & efficient service but food variety needs improvements.
2nd visit- lovely relaxing resort- had a great time.
reviews.text: CHECK IN ~ was a breeze and we were sent to our room within 10 mins after arrival.

reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTING AFTER THE HYPE ON THE WEBSITE
reviews.text: ROOM ~ was clean, spacious and beautiful. True that it was a little bit dark due to the color of the ceiling as it was wood and we have no complains because this IS the concept of the hotel, traditionally Malay. A playpen with a mattress aka babycot was provided but later in the evening, we requested to exchange the cot with a roll away bed instead as our baby had difficulty falling asleep in the playpen. When we return to the hotel after dinner, it was all done. Very efficient coordination between front office and housekeeping team. On the 3rd day of our stay, our baby wet the duvet cover. So we called housekeeping to change it for us. They came within minutes. Again, thumbs up for the speedy service!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: AIR COND ~ Some reviewed that the airconds were noisy. Yes, it is not quiet but the white noise was not too much for us and our baby. It also helped drown away the live bands singing at the lobby till midnight.
reviews.title: Wonderful, Fantastic Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: BATS, MOSQUITOES & OTHER INSECTS ~ Mosquito repellent worked perfectly in keeping mosquitoes away and keeping doors and windows closed after 6pm also helps. Saw bats flying around outside the room and also in the verandah. Again, just keep all doors and windows closed once the sky is dark.
reviews.title: Fab place for a honeymoon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed here 2 nights and stay at Bayview Hotel at Kuah town for 3 nights.
reviews.title: wonderful holiday at Langkawi

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room, swimming pools and service quite nice (my kids love the swimming pool so much) check in and check out very fast. walk distance about 10 minutes from resort, one seafood restaurant, Orchird Ria is strongly recommand, the food is so delicious,
reviews.title: Lovely Lovely Hotel, location, people and Food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: next time come to Langkawi, sure must go Orchid Ria.
reviews.title: A wonderful, beautiful Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: This hotel is lovely. It is in lush gardens and is just so nice and relaxing to stay at.
reviews.title: Elegant but rapped in a time capsule

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Langkawi is lovely also, hired a car for a week and went exploring. People lovely and nothing hidden behind the smile. A pretty close to unique feature when travelling etc.... They really were happy to see you, serve you, talk to you. no pressure to sell you anything. Just genuine and fun and full of smiles.
reviews.title: Nice place but needs a refurb

aka: Meritus Pelangi Beach Resort & Spa, Langkawi Hotel Pantai Cenang
description: Designed in the style of a traditional Malay village, Meritus Pelangi's 355 guestrooms and suites are housed in wooden chalets that are spread across 35 acres of lush landscaped gardens along a stretch of white sandy shores. Be ushered into a world of ethnic charm and tropical tranquility at this award-winning resort!
